talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

$Boy${action:Talk}
I was told to give you this. I think it's your payment for the mission.

$Boy${action:Talk}
Oh, and Manager Maisa was muttering the name {user_nick} and looking all flustered earlier… That's your name isn't it?
You should go see what's up.

$Child Hiver$
…………………………………………………

$Fallen Command Scroll$
…………………………………………………

$Hologram Norfe$
…………………………………………………

$Manager Maisa$
Welcome! They said your pay would come out of the Rhadames budget. Did you get it?

${user_nick}$
Uh, yeah. But is it true that you were looking for me?

$Manager Maisa$
Me? Oh, it's about this…
(Maisa hands you a paper.)

${user_nick}$
'The time has come. Meet me in Vulcan Swamp.'
(Hmm... It's from Hiver. She did say she would call me when the time came.)

$Manager Maisa$
Do you know who it's from?

${user_nick}$
I have a pretty good idea. Thanks for passing this along.

${user_nick}$
(Guess I better hurry to Vulcan Swamp.)

$Child Hiver${action:Talk}
It's been a while., {user_nick}. So, do you have anything of use for me?

${user_nick}$
Well, I had a good rest, but was there anything in particular you wanted of me?
Oh, were you really expecting me to find the location of Norfe?

$Child Hiver${sound:npc_Childhiver_qu9932_sp_01.ogg}
Well, you've been moving around a lot, Pymon's Superstar.
Or, now that you've changed your boss, I guess I should call you Hwaran's Right Hand.

${user_nick}$
Pfft, since when was a petty mercenary called something so grandiose as a commander's "right hand?"

$Child Hiver${sound:npc_Childhiver_qu9932_sp_02.ogg}
An orphan who rose from the dregs of society to become next in line for the leadership of a mercenary band,
then returned home after the group was disbanded and kept working under Hwaran? Doesn't that make you here right-hand man?

${user_nick}$
(It seems she's been doing her homework on me.)
Odd of you to say that. Are we just here to chat? You said it's time to do something.

$Child Hiver${sound:npc_Childhiver_qu9932_sp_03.ogg}
Hehehe… Well, if we're going to work together, I need to know what kind of person you are, what kind of work you do,
and, most importantly, what your weaknesses are.

${user_nick}$
My weaknesses?

$Child Hiver${sound:npc_Childhiver_qu9932_sp_04.ogg}
That healer… What was her name again? Oh yes, 'Kanna,' right?
Rumor has it you were spotted in the Blue Raven Territory right after Kanna was invited to the Julian Pavilion.

${user_nick}$
…!

$Child Hiver$
Yes, that's exactly the reaction I was looking for, hehehe...
I heard you warned people before the territory was scorched. How did you know the fire was coming?

${user_nick}$
What do you want to say? Just get to the point.

$Child Hiver${sound:npc_Childhiver_qu9932_sp_05.ogg}
It's simple. If you betray me, I'll kill the healer of Red Lotus Palace Main Street.
Got it?

${user_nick}$
(First Kyle, then Hwaran, and now this girl is threatening me? I'm sick and tired of this crap. Maybe I should just kill her right here.)

$Child Hiver$
Do you understand, or not? What is it? Cat got your tongue?

${user_nick}$
(… Calm down. Now… Now is not the time.)
Fine, you're right. I'm Hwaran's right-hand man.
Think you'll get away with messing with me? Are you honestly looking for that kind of trouble?

$Child Hiver${sound:npc_Childhiver_qu9932_sp_06.ogg}
Pfft... Bahahahaha!
You really are funny, you know that? You remind me of my former human self.

$Child Hiver${sound:npc_Childhiver_qu9932_sp_07.ogg}
I was foolish enough love to someone, to hold them dear in my heart, to trust them and believe they had good will…
I wanted to protect the ones I cared about so much, even when it exposed my weakness. Yes, you're just like how I used to be.

${user_nick}$
… Be quiet. You disgust me.

$Child Hiver${sound:npc_Childhiver_qu9932_sp_08.ogg}
And in the end you'll be betrayed and eventually end up dead. There's no such thing as hope in this world. You'll learn that too if you become a Child.

${user_nick}$
You go from disgusting me to making me sick.

$Child Hiver$
Fine, that's enough small talk.

$Child Hiver${action:Talk}
Let's get down to business. The time really has come.

$Child Hiver$
Take this. The names of the recipients are written down. I'll mark their locations on your map...
There. Just deliver this without saying anything and they'll take care of the rest.
(Hiver marks the location of the Childs waiting in the Vulcan Swamp.)

${user_nick}$
Pfft, if you just wanted me to quietly deliver a package, why bother with the bombastic threats...?
And if they are already waiting in Vulcan Swamp, what do you need me to deliver it for?

$Child Hiver$
I have other matters to deal with. And it's important enough that I cannot tell you.
I have laid all the groundwork, so all you have to do is deliver this to them. Surely you can do that at least?

$Child Hiver$
Oh yes, take this too.

$Child Hiver$
I infused my power into Nephrite's insignia.
They'll know you're my messenger when they see it.

${user_nick}$
How nice of you to look after me.

$Child Hiver$
And, just so you know, if anyone but a Child opens that seal, I will learn of it immediately.
Don't even think about reading that letter.

${user_nick}$
Yes ma'am! Then I'll be on my way to make the delivery.

$Child${action:Talk}
What is it? Do you have a death wish?
Oh… That aura... It's from Hiver. Just who might you be?

${user_nick}$
(You silently hand over the Messenger's Mark and Sealed Command Scroll.)

$Child$
I can't believe she's using Nephrite's insignia like this.
She's a nasty girl, but she sure is sharp.

$Child$
(The Child is startled upon reading the command scroll.)
Wow… Seriously? Is this for real?

${user_nick}$
I haven't read it, so I wouldn't know.

$Child$
Right, it makes sense she wouldn't keep a worm like you informed.
Finally, this is my chance!

${user_nick}$
(What could possibly have been in that letter? I have a bad feeling about this...)

$Child${action:Talk}
Hmm… I can smell Hiverall the way from here.
So, what's she saying this time?

${user_nick}$
(You silently hand over the Messenger's Mark and Sealed Command Scroll.)

$Child$
You're finally here! It's about time.
(Hurriedly grabs the letter and starts reading.)

$Child$
It was here the whole time, hehehe...
All right, I'll tell the others. This is a chance to kill two birds with one stone!

${user_nick}$
(I gotta find out what is in that letter. There's something ominous about all this.
I can't just grab it, so I'll have to see it somehow after the Child is done.)

$Child${action:Talk}
What brings a worm like you here?
Hiver said she'd inform us of the next target soon...

${user_nick}$
(… The next target? Well, I should hand over the letter first. The seal needs to be broken, after all.)

$Child$
(The Child smiles while reading the letter.)
Well, the source is trustworthy. But... why are you still standing there?

${user_nick}$
I'm just curious. What's in the instructions that has everyone so stirred up?

$Child$
How dare you speak so casually to a superior, worm?

${user_nick}$
……O high and mighty one?

$Child$
You dare play games with a Child, worm? Do you want to die?

${user_nick}$
Phew… Listen, let's just make a deal.

$Child$
Deal? What kind of deal?

${user_nick}$
Your life for the information!

${user_nick}$
Let's see... Huh? It only says the coordinates and the time.
The time is in one hour, and the coordinates...

${user_nick}$
Wait, the coordinates are the location of… Rhadames!

${user_nick}$
(You've finally done it! Hiver... has sent the Childs the coordinates of Rhadames.
They set a time and plan to attack them all at once.

${user_nick}$
(You want me to stand by and watch that horrible scene again? Watch people get swept up in a battle with Childs and die like trampled ants?
Like the people of Aergal? Again?)

${user_nick}$
Hell no! I can't let this happen.
I gotta get to Rhadames!

${user_nick}$
Norfe! Hey old man! Listen!

$Hologram Norfe$
(No response)

${user_nick}$
It's an emergency! Don't tell me the audio is broken again? Can you hear me?

$Inventor Narlin${sound:npc_Narlin_qu9932_sp_01.ogg}
Gosh, what a mess. Only the video projector is working at the moment. Hang on.

${user_nick}$
We don't have time to wait! This is an emergency!
Something serious is about to happen!

$Boy$
Umm... Norfe is out of the office right now. Do you have a message?
<html>$Quest Complete$</html>

qstep_change.comment: 푸까영 몬스터 젠+사냥. 스텝 8로 넘어가는 건 6스텝 사냥 시퀀스에서 처리 완료.

journal.title: Invitation to the Swamp
journal.contents:
According to the boy, MHN Manager Maisa is looking for you. You better go see what the problem is this time.

Rhadames - Manager Maisa
journal.destination: Talk to Manager Maisa in Rhadames

journal.title: Like Filthy Mud
journal.contents:
Maisa handed you a letter from an anonymous sender. It tells you to meet the sender in the Vulcan Swamp. Though there is no name attached, it is obvious who wrote it. Time to go meet Hiver.
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

Rhadames (Anti-Goddess Faction Secret Passage) → Vulcan Swamp (Hiver)
journal.destination: (Solo) Find Hiver in the Vulcan Swamp
journal.todo_msg: Find Hiver in the Vulcan Swamp.

journal.title: Sealed Command Scroll
journal.contents:
Hiver tries threatening {user_nick} by mentioning Kanna. You are getting sick and tired of the constant threats and pressure coming your way despite having become so strong. Anyway, for now you have no choice but to cooperate with Hiver as ordered by Hwaran. You'll have to keep listening to what Hiver has to say.
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

Rhadames (Anti-Goddess Faction Secret Passage) → Vulcan Swamp (Hiver)
journal.todo_msg: Hiver is giving you a Command Scroll. Take it from her.

journal.title: Deliver Orders Ⅰ
journal.contents:
Hiver has given you a Sealed Command Scroll and Messenger's Mark. What kind of message is in here that she would even go as far as infusing her own power to seal it? Anyway, you have your orders from Hwaran, so you better help Hiver by delivering the orders.
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

Rhadames (Anti-Goddess Faction Secret Passage) → Vulcan Swamp (Child)
journal.destination: (Solo) Deliver Command Scroll to the Childs in Vulcan Swamp
journal.todo_msg: Deliver the Command Scroll to the Childs.

journal.title: Deliver Orders Ⅱ
journal.contents:
The Child is extremely pleased to have received Hiver's orders. Just what opportunity did they mean? It's ominous, but there's nothing you can do about it. Deliver the Command Scroll to the next Child.
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

Rhadames (Anti-Goddess Faction Secret Passage) → Vulcan Swamp (Child)
journal.destination: (Solo) Deliver Command Scroll to the Childs in Vulcan Swamp
journal.todo_msg: Deliver the Command Scroll to the Childs.

journal.title: Deliver Orders Ⅲ
journal.contents:
A chance to kill two birds with one stone? That only makes you more nervous. Just what is Hiver planning? You want to read the scroll, but it is sealed in such a manner that only a Child may open it without her knowing. But... that won't matter after a Child opens it, right?
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

Rhadames (Anti-Goddess Faction Secret Passage) → Vulcan Swam (Child)
journal.destination: (Solo) Deliver Command Scroll to the Childs in Vulcan Swamp
journal.todo_msg: Deliver the Command Scroll to the Childs.

journal.title: Hand Over the Command Scroll
journal.contents:
You asked the Child what was in the scroll, but got no answer. Well, nothing is free in Mistland, so you should propose a fair trade: the Child's life for the scroll.
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

Rhadames (Anti-Goddess Faction Secret Passage) → Vulcan Swamp (Child)
journal.todo_msg: Defeat the Child and get the Command Scroll.

journal.title: Approaching Danger
journal.contents:
You defeated the Child and got the Command Scroll. As for what it contains...
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

Rhadames (Anti-Goddess Faction Secret Passage) → Vulcan Swamp (Fallen Command Scroll)
journal.todo_msg: The Command Scroll fell. Read it.

journal.title: To Rhadames
journal.contents:
The Command Scroll contained a time and coordinates. The coordinates indicate the location of Rhadames. It is Hiver's strategy to regularly provide the Childs with enemies to fight.
The Childs will soon attack Rhadames!

Rhadames - Hologram Norfe
journal.todo_msg: Rhadames is about to be attacked. You have to warn Norfe!
